results.text: The #MIE2018 conference proceedings are now online! http://ebooks.iospress.nl/ISBN/978-1-61499-852-5 …

Congrats Dr. Sudipta Seal on being inducted into the Florida Inventors Hall of Fame. He has published more than 400 journal papers, conference proceedings papers, book chapters, and three books on nanotechnology. https://today.ucf.edu/seal-inducted-florida-inventors-hall-fame/ …

Hope the attendees and presenters of the “interventions to extend healthspan and lifespan” had a great time in @InvestTatarstan. Feature your work in the conference proceedings via: http://fron.tiers.in/rt/7378 pic.twitter.com/RxuNK0eOEb

Wow!!! @JournalMises is proud to be now indexed by The Public Knowledge Project !!! They put together articles, books and conference proceedings in their database. Our page there is here: enjoy! http://index.pkp.sfu.ca/index.php/browse/index/3174 … Thanks @pkp #Science #knowledge #FreeScience

Open access to the #chi2018 proceedings https://sigchi.org/publications/conference-proceedings/ … @sig_chi

If you are @sig_chi #chi2018 we want to draw your attention to our Open Table of Contents page.
This includes direct, open access to the published PDFs for at least one year after becoming active in the ACM Digital Library.
Includes CHI and many morehttps://sigchi.org/publications/conference-proceedings/ …

This is big. I don’t care much for the XML/HTML5 part, but publishing conference proceedings in a dedicated journal sounds like the way to go. https://twitter.com/mark_riedl/status/987864986881019904 …

Are you an ISMPB Member? Benefits include reduced meeting registration, access to online resources and conference proceedings, committee opportunities. http://ow.ly/ZH5r30jrQam pic.twitter.com/1xF0HmM1Oq
